channel.title: Notepage Bingo Please!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Notepage Bingo Please!" - -Needed for Anonymous

item.title: Re: Notepage Bingo Please!
item.content:encoded: Still need a notepage bingo for iamdigi I am in tiger village

item.title: Re: Notepage Bingo Please!
item.content:encoded: Well I thought it would have been easy to Spy.. guess not.

item.title: Re: Notepage Bingo Please!
item.content:encoded:
Never mind, ill bingo you anyway;)

To iamdigi, i try to bingo you, dont know if can plant a spy in your village. Then you can notebingo me back:)

item.title: Re: Notepage Bingo Please!
item.content:encoded: After looking at it there is no way I can get a spy into either one of your villages. They are both to big and both have Pass Permits and I don't have a counterfeit permit so theres no way you can notepage Bingo me. Sorry.

item.title: Re: Notepage Bingo Please!
item.content:encoded:
@Snowfall.. yeah sounds good. We currently have 0 Peacetime bonus and +1 for Patrolling the village.. No NRF.. Have Creepy Traps. Spy Towers.. Village Size currently 22.. Shouldn't be too hard to get inâ€¦ I'll work on getting some notepages for your side of the Bingo.. Unless you can send me one and Ill send it back through Bucket Menu (I dont know if its tradeable or not)? Hard for me to get notepages.. Only get them from C level mission with Hyuk or Rare on party wheel as far as I know.. anyway let me know. Im assuming from the date posted you posted this today and tomorrow means Monday my time (EST)? Blazons a huge village.. Ill try to get in there but um don't know if I can its like twice our size. Thanks.

@Iamdigi.. If you can get a spy into my village (Water Wing) and I can get one in yours (so you can Bingo me) then I'd be happy to notepage bingo you too :)

item.title: Re: Notepage Bingo Please!
item.content:encoded:
Could someone please Bingo me with a note page please? Can return the favor if needed.

Level: 61 - Jonin
name- iamdigi
Tiger Village

item.title: Re: Notepage Bingo Please!
item.content:encoded: If you wait till morning, i should not have problem with bingoing you, if your village is not unspyable on. Then you can bingo me back Snowfall from Blazon village lvl 55

item.title: Notepage Bingo Please!
item.content:encoded:
I need someone to notepage Bingo me please so I can get Anonymous. I'm currently level 46 Jonin and leader of the Water Wing Village until the Kage comes back on Tuesday. If you need a Bingo back, I'll be happy to do it if I can.

Thank you!
